basic_info.description: I'm Paul Millanes. I am a software developer with experience in multiple technologies. I want to use my skills for the benefit of my community and I am eager to learn. My interest lies in web and mobile development.

projects.title: Integral Management System
projects.description:
I contributed in developing an application to manage and promote sports in the state of Sonora. 
Developed the front-end using React and the back-end using PHP with REST API  and axios. 
Used MySQL for the database management. 
Gathered requirements and managed the project development with tools such as Slack and Github.

projects.title: TusAsesor√≠as
projects.description: I developed a web app to connect students and instructors with a self managed team of 4 engineers using Agile methodologies. We used Angular for the front-end and Node.js with Firebase for the back-end, using Zoom API and Paypal API, and the MVC design pattern. Implemented using Firebase NoSQL Firestore Database. Gathered and documented requirements through user stories and UML diagrams.

projects.title: PetAuxilium
projects.description: I developed a mobile app to assist pets and street animals with a self managed team of 4 engineers using Agile methodologies. We used Google's Flutter for the front-end and Firebase for the back-end, using Google Maps API, Stripe API and the BLoC design pattern. Implemented using Firebase NoSQL Firestore Database. Gathered and documented requirements through user stories and UML diagrams.

projects.title: Cost and Inventory Report System
projects.description: I developed a project to calculate the costs of integral kitchens and send PDF and XLSX inventory reports through email. I used C# Windows Presentation Foundation with the MVVM design pattern and hosted a PostgreSQL database using Clevercloud PaaS. Gathered and documented requirements through user stories and UML diagrams.
